input.prompt:
Research the TF-IDF and BM25 scoring implementations in this codebase. Look in cortical/analysis/ for:
1. The TF-IDF calculation details
2. BM25 implementation and parameters (k1, b)
3. How per-document vs global TF-IDF works

Return a detailed technical analysis with specific code references (file:line format).
